    Class representing an ERTPoint using strings as feature names.

      • getERTPoints

        public static <O extends java.io.Serializable> java.util.ArrayList<ERTTrainingPoint<O>> getERTPoints(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> features,
                                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<O> contents)
        Return an ArrayList of ERTPoints created using the given HashMap of features and labels (point are in the same order as the MultiSignal).
        Type Parameters:
        O - Type of contents to be placed in the ERTPoints.
        Parameters:
        features - HashMap containing the features to create the ERTPoints with.
        contents - contents used for the ERTPoints (must be in the same order as the feature values).
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of ERTPoints created using the given MultiSignal and labels.
